data.title: Encyclopaedia Metallum: The Metal Archives
data.text:
Current Floyd London Bass (1988-1996, 2006-2008, 2023-present) See also: Live 'n' Kickin Stumpy Munroe Drums (1988-1996, 1999-2002, 2006-2008, 2023-present) Andy "Tantrum" McCafferty Guitars (1988-1991, 2023-present) Ricky Warwick Vocals, Guitars (1988-1996, 1999-2002, 2006-2008, 2023-present) See also: Thin Lizzy, Black Star Riders, Ricky Warwick, ex-(sic), ex-Circus Diablo Past Pete "Freezin" Friesen Guitars (1991-1996, 2006-2008) See also: ex-Bruce Dickinson (live), ex-Alice Cooper, ex-Sack Trick, ex-VO5 Gavin Gray Bass (1999-2002) See also: Tank, ex-Blitzkrieg, ex-Tygers of Pan Tang Nick Parson Guitars (1999-2002) See also: ex-Energetic Krusher, Drama Club Rejects, ex-Hellbastard, ex-Heavy Water, ex-Runt, ex-Southern Cross, ex-SuperCharger, ex-The Yo-Yos, ex-Whatever

Floyd London Bass (1988-1996, 2006-2008, 2023-present) See also: Live 'n' Kickin Stumpy Munroe Drums (1988-1996, 1999-2002, 2006-2008, 2023-present) Andy "Tantrum" McCafferty Guitars (1988-1991, 2023-present) Ricky Warwick Vocals, Guitars (1988-1996, 1999-2002, 2006-2008, 2023-present) See also: Thin Lizzy, Black Star Riders, Ricky Warwick, ex-(sic), ex-Circus Diablo
